page.title: 17Playground Games in Hanham.
page.content:
{Teddy Bears} Six people make a circle round an object.One person gives everyone a name and calls one out. That person runs round the circle. He must get back to his place then run to the middle to pick up the object. In the next game that person calls out the name. {Creep Mouse } One person stands against a wall with his back to everyone else.The other players creep up behind him. If he turns round and sees someone move that person goes back to the start.If someone creeps up without being seen and touches the watcher he shouts "Creep Mouse!" Then he is the watcher.
OTHER GAMES{Bulldogs;Sevens;Ships; {Off_ground touch;Truth;Dare;Kiss or {Promise;Releaster;Poker;Drain Touch.
